CustomField.description: Campaign Attrribution will consider records that fall between the Campaign Influence Time Period and the Customer Path transition date + Attribution Look Forward Buffer (this field). This allows you to Attribute Campaign Member records that do not exist by the time the Customer Path record is created.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Campaign Attrribution will consider records that fall between the Campaign Influence Time Period and the Customer Path transition date +Attribution Look Forward Buffer (this field).
CustomField.label: Attribution Look Forward Buffer
